languages.text: "Надзиратели заблокированы в охранных комплексах, а каторжане объединены общей ненавистью к династии и одурманены байками о свободе".
"The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, and the convicts are now united by their common hatred for the dynasty and are obsessed with the tales of freedom."
languages.original_text: "Надзиратели заблокированы в охранных комплексах, а каторжане объединены общей ненавистью к династии и одурманены байками о свободе".

traits.locale_text: "The wardens are trapped inside the security facilities, and the convicts are now united by the common hatred for the dynasty and are obsesses with the tales of freedom."
"The wardens are trapped inside the security facilities, and the convicts are now united by the common hatred for the dynasty and are obsesses with the tales of freedom."
"The wardens are trapped inside the security facilities, and the convicts are now united by their common hatred for the dynasty and are obsessed with the tales of freedom."
"The wardens are trapped inside the security facilities, and the convicts are now united by their common hatred for the dynasty and are obsessed with the tales of freedom."
"The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, and the convicts are now united by their common hatred for the dynasty and are obsessed with the tales of freedom."
"The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, and the convicts are now united by their common hatred for the dynasty and are obsessed with the tales of freedom."

languages.text: “监察员都被困在了安全设施里。如今，那些囚犯们由于对王朝共同的仇恨而团结在一起，被自由的承诺深深蛊惑。”
languages.original_text: "The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, and the convicts are now united by their common hatred for the dynasty and are obsessed with the tales of freedom."

traits.locale_text: “监察员都被困在了安全设施里。如今，那些囚犯们由于对王朝共同的仇恨而团结在一起，被自由的承诺深深蛊惑。”

languages.text: «Los guardias están atrapados en las instalaciones de seguridad, y los convictos están ahora unidos por su odio común a la dinastía y obsesionados con los relatos sobre la libertad».
languages.original_text: "The wardens are trapped inside the security facilities, and the convicts are now united by their common hatred for the dynasty and are obsessed with the tales of freedom."

traits.locale_text: «Los guardias están atrapados en las instalaciones de seguridad, y los convictos están ahora unidos por su odio común a la dinastía y obsesionados con los relatos sobre la libertad».

languages.text: 「看守らは警備施設内に閉じ込められていて、受刑者は今や王朝に対する共通の憎しみで団結し、自由の物語に心を奪われています」
languages.original_text: "The wardens are trapped inside the security facilities, and the convicts are now united by their common hatred for the dynasty and are obsessed with the tales of freedom."

traits.locale_text: 「看守らは警備施設内に閉じ込められていて、受刑者は今や王朝に対する共通の憎しみで団結し、自由の物語に心を奪われています」
「看守らは警備施設内に閉じ込められていて、受刑者は今や王朝に対する共通の憎しみで団結し、自由の物語に心を奪われています」

languages.text: « Les contremaîtres sont piégés à l'intérieur des installations de sécurité et les détenus, unis par leur haine de votre dynastie, ne pensent plus qu'à une chose : la liberté. »
languages.original_text: "The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, and the convicts are now united by their common hatred for the dynasty and are obsessed with the tales of freedom."

traits.locale_text: « Les contremaîtres sont piégés à l'intérieur des installations de sécurité et les détenus, unis par leur haine de votre dynastie, ne pensent plus qu'à une chose : la liberté. »

languages.text: "Die Wärter sind in den Sicherheitsanlagen eingesperrt, und die Sträflinge sind nun geeint durch ihren Hass auf die Dynastie — und besessen vom Traum der Freiheit."
languages.original_text: "The wardens are trapped inside the security facilities, and the convicts are now united by their common hatred for the dynasty and are obsessed with the tales of freedom."

traits.locale_text: "Die Wärter sind in den Sicherheitsanlagen eingesperrt, und die Sträflinge sind nun geeint durch ihren Hass auf die Dynastie — und besessen vom Traum der Freiheit."
"Die Wärter sind in den Sicherheitsanlagen eingesperrt, und die Sträflinge sind nun geeint durch ihren Hass auf die Dynastie — und besessen vom Traum der Freiheit."

languages.text: "Gözetmenler muhafız tesislerinde mahsur kalmış, mahkûmlarsa hanedanlığa olan ortak nefretin ardında birleşmiş ve özgürlük öyküleri sayıklamaya başlamış."
languages.original_text: "The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, and the convicts are now united by their common hatred for the dynasty and are obsessed with the tales of freedom."
